title: Arbor Snowboards :: 2016 Product Profiles - Steepwater
description: A collaboration with Steve Klassen, 5x winner of the Verbier Extreme and owner Wave Rave Snowboard Shop in Mammoth. Steve’s 20 years of R&D experience helped us create a rocket built for performance at speed and through variable, big mountain terrain. Expect Ferrari like acceleration and control.
tags: Product Profiles,Arbor Snowboards,Snowboarding,Camber,Steve Klassen,Wave Rave,Arbor,Steepwater,Product Video
